title: Piyush Panigrahi
text: I am a Consultant at the World Bank Development Research Group and a Research Affiliate of the CESifo Network. I received my Ph.D.Â in Economics from University of California, Berkeley in May 2021. You can find my CV here. I can be reached at piyushp@berkeley.edu or ppanigrahi@worldbank.org.
